faq.question: How do I create an account?
faq.answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button, fill in your details, and verify your email to create an account.

faq.question: How do I search for jobs?
faq.answer: Use the search bar on the homepage to enter keywords, job titles, or locations to find relevant job listings.

faq.question: Can I apply for jobs directly through the portal?
faq.answer: Yes, once you find a job listing, click on 'Apply Now' and follow the instructions to submit your application.

faq.question: How do I upload my resume?
faq.answer: Go to your profile section and click on 'Upload Resume' to add your latest resume in PDF or DOC format.

faq.question: Is my personal information secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we use advanced security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access.

faq.question: Can employers contact me directly?
faq.answer: Yes, if your profile matches their job requirements, recruiters can reach out to you through the platform.

faq.question: How do I track my job applications?
faq.answer: You can check the 'My Applications' section to see the status of your submitted job applications.

faq.question: Are there any fees for job seekers?
faq.answer: No, creating an account and applying for jobs is completely free for job seekers.
